name: Linkjs
body:
#About

Link.js turns your url and emails and wraps it in ```<a>```s for you.

#Demos

Publish your own demos by forking!

[DOM Demo](http://jsfiddle.net/kvnq4d8d/)

[Alert Demo](http://jsfiddle.net/Lgf5pf8p/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
